_comment: Change <node_dir_name> to the dir name local to each Node. ex: 'home' or 'root' or 'root/cache'
_comment1: Change <home_mount_dir_name> to your home mount dir name if different ex: 'home' or 'root'
_comment2: user-id will be resolved to current username in runtime. You can also change to your user-id here.
_comment3: Change <priv_key_file> to your private key if it is different.
_comment4: Change to your node IPs. The Public IPs of the nodes will be the keys of the node_dict
_vpc_comment: If your cluster has a dedicated VPC IP that is reachable from other nodes in the cluster, set it to that (or) else set the same as the main host IP/Name
